main event: Residents of Berkeley, California observed an unidentified flying object over the city on May 26, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as being round in shape, approximately 30-40 feet in diameter, and emitting a reddish-orange glow.
The object was observed for approximately 5-10 minutes, during which time it hovered above the city and moved erratically at high speed before disappearing from view.
The object appeared brilliant, round, and luminous, and remained stationary for most of the time before accelerating rapidly and disappearing.
The investigation concluded that the object was beyond doubt a UFO, and no satisfactory explanation could be given at the time.
Further investigation of this sighting was recommended.
